name: Tree With Blossoms Mixed Media Original Art Painting
description:
Three little robins perch on the branches of a tree with pink and white blossoms and a blue sky background.

-"Blossom Tree" 
-28"X22"X2"
-Mixed Media on Stretched Canvas
-by Blenda Tyvoll

I painted this piece on gallery wrapped stretched canvas. The 2" edges are painted light teal. 

The painting is signed on the front and on the back.

Your monitor colors may vary the colors slightly from the original art. 

Copyright of work, including all rights of reproduction in any form, are held by the artist, Blenda Tyvoll.

name: Be Courageous Original Blenda Studio Painting
description:
My inspiration for this abstract painting is from the following quote, "Love bravely, live bravely, be courageous, there's really nothing to lose" Jewel.

Title: Be Courageous
Size: 16X20X1"
Medium: Acrylic on Canvas
by: Blenda Tyvoll

I painted this piece on gallery wrapped stretched canvas. The 1" edges are painted green. 

The painting is signed on the front and on the back.

Your monitor colors may vary the colors slightly from the original art. 

"blendastudio.com" Watermark will not appear on your painting.

Copyright of work, including all rights of reproduction in any form, are held by the artist, Blenda Tyvoll.

name: Summerscape Landscape Original Mixed Media Painting
description:
A colorful landscape painting inspired by carefree summer days.

Title: Live in the Sunshine Series #2
Size: 12X12"
Media: Mixed Media/Canvas
by: Blenda Tyvoll

This is an original one of a kind painting on gallery wrapped stretched canvas.

name: Original Mixed Media Painting - Cheery Blossom Tree
Americans in Paris Signed Print by Blenda Tyvoll
description:
A tree rises up from a map of the city of Paris. Two red winged black birds (they are found only in North America) sit amongst the branches of a tree covered in orange balls and leaves. This is a signed print of one of my original paintings. Available in three sizes 8x10 matted or 11X14" and 13x19 unmatted. - Americans in Paris - Signed Giclee Print - Image Sizes: 8x10" 11X14"12x16" - Matted print fits a standard 11x14" frame - By Blenda Tyvoll (me) Prices vary according to size. description:
Two little chickadee birds sit amongst round leafy branches. Look closely at this painting and pieces of collaged road maps can be seen peeking through the textured paint layers in certain parts of the canvas. Circle shaped leaves and flowers hang from the tree branches. Some of the leaves are falling softly to the ground. description:

The background of the original piece was created by collaging vintage dictionary (lexicon) pages cut into squares. name: Boughs in Leaf Large Signed Print
description:
Two happy little bluebirds sit perched among the leaves. To add visual interest in the lower right side is a portion of a road map peeking out from beneath the background. You can see how the words of a quote about trees with leaves has added a textured pattern to the background. The quote: "Give me a land of boughs in leaf, a land of trees that stand, where trees have fallen there is grief, I love no leafless land." is by A.E.Housman, an early 20th century poet. This is a print from one of my original paintings. Available in two sizes, 8X10 matted or 11X14" or 13X19" unmatted. - Boughs in Leaf - Signed Giclee Print - Image Sizes: 8X10" or 11X14" or approx 12X16" - Matted print fits a standard 11X14" frame - By Blenda Tyvoll (me) Prices vary according to size. name: Mint Green Bird Original Painting on Canvas by Blenda Tyvoll
description:
Available for purchase at Singer Hill Cafe & Gallery Oregon City. This little minty green bird is standing on a background of squares with green. An original mixed media painting. - "Minty Green Bird" - 12X12X1/2" - Mixed Media Collage/Acrylic/Canvas - by Blenda Tyvoll Painted and collaged on gallery stretched canvas, no staples showing. Ready to hang on your walls unframed or have it framed to match your decor. I painted the bird image on illustration board then collaged him to a canvas that I originally painted to be an abstract. The two were meant to be together.

Here's a blog post about Minty Green Bird

Artwork is signed on the front and on the back. Image was scanned to represent original colors, but your monitor colors may vary the colors slightly. Copyright of work, including all rights of reproduction in any form, are held by the artist, Blenda Tyvoll.

name: Original Canvas Painting Yellow Pear with Squares
description:
This large yellow pear still life is on 16X20" canvas and has a pattern of square shapes in the background. An original fine art painting on gallery wrapped canvas by Blenda Tyvoll, me. No staples showing, with deep 3/4" thick edges that are painted burnt umber (see studio view). A hanging wire is attached and a protective UV varnish has been applied to the painted surface. Painting is ready to hang on your wall as soon as it is unwrapped from the shipping box. You may also like this:

Green Pear Painting with Squares

Copyright of work, including all rights of reproduction in any form, are held by the artist.

name: Red Pear with Circles Original Painting
description:
This large red pear still life is on 16X20X3/4" stretched canvas and has a pattern of circle shapes in the background.

An original fine art painting on gallery wrapped canvas by Blenda Tyvoll(me).

No staples showing, with deep 3/4" thick edges that are painted burnt umber (see studio view).

This is part of a series of pear paintings. Each one is made to have a vintage antiqued look. The background has a pattern design.

A hanging wire is attached and a protective UV varnish has been applied to the painted surface. Painting is ready to hang on your wall as soon as it is unwrapped from the shipping box.

Please feel free to contact blenda@blendatyvoll.com with any questions you may have.

Copyright of work, including all rights of reproduction in any form, are held by the artist.

Painting was photographed to represent original colors, but your monitor colors may vary the colors slightly.
